flawed_nl_solution:
A jar of almond butter costs 3 * 3 = $<<3*3=9>>9.
It takes half a jar to make a batch of cookies, so it costs 9 / 0.5 = $<<9/0.5=18>>18 to use almond butter.
It costs 3 / 0.5 = $<<3/0.5=6>>6 to use peanut butter.
Thus, it costs 18 - 6 = $<<18-6=21>>21 more to make a batch of almond butter cookies than peanut butter cookies.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
